name: sporadic
description:
Go through the maze using variable gravity and extraordinary thinking. The main character is controlled by the WAD keys - jump, left and right. The cursor arrows on the keyboard are used to change the direction of the gravity vector, 🠕 - gravity turns over, ⬅ ➞ - gravity changes to the right and left, to the sides. In the process of passing, various objects will interfere with you, they will try to crush you and block the passages in the maze. As you progress, the difficulty of passing becomes more complicated.

    By pressing the ESC key, you can temporarily exit the main menu. After that, you can resume the game in the same location from which the exit to the main menu occurred. The ENTER key also works. The mouse can not be used at all.

    The game is adapted to mobile browsers. Management takes place according to a similar scheme. There are buttons on the screen that simulate cursor keys, and a virtual joystick for moving the character.
